This is a great place.  It is 1/2 block away from the Palau Nacional de Musica.  Perfect location for a meal before any peformance there.You want crepes, this is a great place with a huge menu and reasonable prices.The crepes are delicious, just take a look at this one.  yelp.com/biz_photos/cnPp…  The chorizo and huevo crepe was even better.They have four restaurant locations around Barcelona and two Creperie locations (including one in the La Bouqueria Mercado right off La Rambla).
